participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Frustrated and weary, Michael often feels overwhelmed by his personal and professional life.
participant_1.background: my wife spends all my money. i'm 40 years old. i hate my job. i work as a car salesman.

participant_2.name: Eli
participant_2.personality: Eli is pragmatic and disciplined, with a strong sense of duty shaped by his military background.
participant_2.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i live in canada. i did not graduate high school. i am in the army.

content.text: I am not sure what you do for a living?
